mapper.select: SELECT o.*, p.pno, p.cate, p.pname, p.company, pi.mainimg, od.pcount, od.options, od.price FROM `orders` AS o JOIN `orderdetail` AS od ON o.ono = od.ono JOIN `product` AS p ON p.pno = od.pno JOIN `productimg` AS pi ON p.pno = pi.pno WHERE o.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY o.odate DESC

SELECT o.*, p.pno,p.uid, p.cate, p.pname, p.company, pi.mainimg, od.pcount, od.options, od.price FROM `orders` AS o JOIN `orderdetail` AS od ON o.ono = od.ono JOIN `product` AS p ON p.pno = od.pno JOIN `productimg` AS pi ON p.pno = pi.pno

SELECT od.ono, o.odate, COUNT(od.ono) AS `count`, o.total ,ANY_VALUE(p.pname) AS pname FROM `orderdetail` AS od JOIN `orders` AS o ON o.ono = od.ono JOIN `product` AS p ON od.pno = p.pno WHERE o.uid = #{uid} GROUP BY od.ono

SELECT od.ono, o.odate, COUNT(od.ono) AS `count`, o.total ,ANY_VALUE(p.pname) AS pname FROM `orderdetail` AS od JOIN `orders` AS o ON o.ono = od.ono JOIN `product` AS p ON od.pno = p.pno WHERE o.uid = #{uid} AND o.odate BETWEEN #{searchDate} AND #{nowDate} GROUP BY od.ono

SELECT o.*, p.pno, p.cate, p.pname, p.company, pi.mainimg, od.pcount, od.options, od.price, p.discount, p.deliprice FROM `orders` AS o JOIN `orderdetail` AS od ON o.ono = od.ono JOIN `product` AS p ON p.pno = od.pno JOIN `productimg` AS pi ON p.pno = pi.pno WHERE o.ono = #{ono}
